generate_grid_1d[source]

generate_grid_1d(shape, pixel_size=1, flag_fourier=False, dtype=torch.float32, device=device(type='cuda'))

This function generates 1D Fourier grid, and is centered at the middle of the array Inputs: shape - length of the array pixel_size - pixel size Optional parameters: flag_fourier - flag indicating whether the final array is circularly shifted should be false when computing real space coordinates should be true when computing Fourier coordinates Outputs: x_lin - 1D grid (real or fourier)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

generate_grid_2d[source]

generate_grid_2d(shape, pixel_size=1, flag_fourier=False, dtype=torch.float32, device=device(type='cuda'))

This function generates 2D Fourier grid, and is centered at the middle of the array Inputs: shape - shape of the grid (number of y pixels, number of x pixels) pixel_size - pixel size Optional parameters: flag_fourier - flag indicating whether the final array is circularly shifted should be false when computing real space coordinates should be true when computing Fourier coordinates Outputs: y_lin, x_lin - 2D grid Usage: y_lin, x_lin = generate_grid_2d(...)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ImageRotation[source]

ImageRotation(shape, axis=0, pad=True, pad_value=0, dtype=torch.float32, device=device(type='cuda'))

A rotation class compute 3D rotation using FFT

HSV_to_RGB[source]

HSV_to_RGB(cin)

HSV to RGB transformation.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

P1A_to_HSV[source]

P1A_to_HSV(cin, vmin=None, vmax=None)

Transform a complex array into an RGB image, mapping phase to hue, amplitude to value and keeping maximum saturation.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

imsave[source]

imsave(a, filename=None, vmin=None, vmax=None, cmap=None)

imsave(a) converts array a into, and returns a PIL image imsave(a, filename) returns the image and also saves it to filename imsave(a, ..., vmin=vmin, vmax=vmax) clips the array to values between vmin and vmax. imsave(a, ..., cmap=cmap) uses a matplotlib colormap.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
